value.title: StarCraft 2: SERIES of the Year? Proxying EACH OTHER's Natural! (Astrea vs Percival)
value.excerpt: Very fun best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Percival (Terran) and Astrea (Protoss). This may very well be the best series of professional StarCraft 2 of 2022. value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral Plays The BROOD LORD Micro Trick! (Cure vs Serral)
value.excerpt: Long macro game of professional StarCraft 2 between Serral, the current SC2 World Champion, and Cure. In this match Cure decides to open up with a Terran turtle style.
